∇Fk​(𝐰k,it)∇subscript𝐹𝑘superscriptsubscript𝐰𝑘𝑖𝑡\nabla F_{k}(\mathbf{w}_{k,i}^{t}) Full local gradient for i𝑖i iteration

references: Supposed that C𝐶C clients will be selected as committee clients, the local model of c𝑐c-th committee client for c=1,…,C𝑐1…𝐶c=1,...,C at round t𝑡t is expressed as 𝐰c,τtsuperscriptsubscript𝐰𝑐𝜏𝑡\mathbf{w}_{c,\tau}^{t}. Assume that we have a total of K𝐾K clients, and m𝑚m gradients will be accepted at each round, which are verified by C𝐶C committee members. Also, we represent the committee client set, the training client set and the aggregation client set at round t𝑡t as Sctsuperscriptsubscript𝑆𝑐𝑡S_{c}^{t}, Sbtsuperscriptsubscript𝑆𝑏𝑡S_{b}^{t} and Satsuperscriptsubscript𝑆𝑎𝑡S_{a}^{t} respectively. The relevant symbols are shown in Table I.
